title: The Vigilantes
description: Having missed the chance to purchase the human girl Cali, Draven sets off on a journey to find her. Convinced he can persuade her owner Byron to sell her, Draven follows Byron into the mountains. Instead of finding Byron, Draven stumbles upon a group of vigilante humans. The vigilantes detain him, and he struggles to keep his humanity in the face of their brutality. Now he must convince them to let him go if he ever wants to reach Cali...or to survive.If you're a fan of horror, you'll love this intense read!
author: Lena Hillbrand
